price: ‹ ߊߟߊ߫› ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߤߍ߲߬ ߌߟߋ߫ ߓߙߌ߬ߛߌ߫ ߸ ߡߎ߲߬ ߦߴߌ ߟߊ߫ ߌ ߕߍ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߕߌ߲ߓߌߘߌ߲ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߫ ߝߍ߬؟
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
